constituent: vapor, water, water droplets, water pistol, landed fish, reclining, lying down, one, floor, fishhook
heisigStory: Think of this character as a sibling of that for spirit. Simply replace sheaves with drops of water on the left in order to get vapor.
koohiiStory1: Water vapor almost looks like a spirit but has no soul.
koohiiStory2: Wolverine disappears into water vapor, seemingly his spirit dissipating into nothingness.
